topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade (Beta): Verifying StoreVirtual Installation Status

body.p: To verify that the StoreVirtual storage system is deployed successfully, perform the following checks:

ol.li: Log in to the undercloud from seed. # ssh heat-admin@<undercloud IP address>
Source stackrc file and list the deployed StoreVirtual nodes. # source stackrc # heat stack-list # nova list|grep vsa
Log in to the StoreVirtual system from the seed using the IP address retrieved from the above steps. # ssh heat-admin@<StoreVirtual system IP Address>

Check the log files. # tail-f /installer.log
The message "Started VM vsa-hostname" indicates the successful installation of StoreVirtual on the machine.The IP Address of the StoreVirtual storage system can be retrieved from this log file.

To display the status of all the StoreVirtual VMs. # virsh list --all
To get more details on the installer logs, check the /var/log/storevirtual-installer.log file.
On successful installation of StoreVirtual VM on Baremetal, go to the Centralized Management Console (CMC) and discover the storage systems.
